name: Super Me CID Quest
description:
Game based on id, ego and superego.

You are on a Journey from a long time ago. An inner journey that you haven’t woken up. You’ll have to confront some challenges in an unusual way to stop delaying the inevitable.

This is Super Me Cid Quest.

Controls:

ESC - Exit Game

Arrows - Move

Space - Sword Attack

Enter - Menus

Credits:

  • Aztturiaz - Sprites, Bosses Creation, Lore, Game Design
  • Carlos_7x - Programming, Level Design
